title: Scientific Inquiry Competency Enhancement Program Through Peer Learning Interactions

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A process promoting qualitative peer interactions in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can effectively present scientific problem-solving strategies three or more times in structured discussions with peers over four weeks.
Learners can correct experimental design errors by 80% or more based on peer feedback.
Learners can analyze two or more conflict cases arising from peer learning interactions by applying qualitative research methodologies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
